question: The forelimb of the monkey, bat, penguin, and alligator look very different on the outside, but their skeletal structures are similar. This evidence suggests that these animals
candidate_answers: (A) may have evolved from a common ancestor. (B) all reproduce in a similar fashion. (C) live in similar environments. (D) should all be able to fly someday.
answer: may have evolved from a common ancestor.
label: A
